title: Gal Can't be Kind to Otaku!?
description: Otaku-kun hides his love for Kiramon, an anime and manga geared toward little girls, from his classmates. But when two gyaru classmates, a bubbly and outgoing Ijichi-san and cool and beautiful Amane-san, notice his character eraser, his plans go awry.
author: Norishiro-chan
